column6: The unthinkable has happened, and Matt Murdock is left stunned.  As the strands of what's left of his life begin to fall to pieces, how will he react? This is Daredevil at his breaking point, and when he snaps, everyone in his way had better stand clear!
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | penciller (cover):Tommy Lee Edwards | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
